value:
$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You made it all this way? What a
shame that people with your skills
are fighting on the wrong side.$k$pBut you'll get no further—not even
with that talented tactician of
yours. Because we have our own.$k$pRobin! Lead us to victory. The
Shepherds must get these villains
to reverse course!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_クロム,ch04_00_Chrom_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Oh! It seems that my eyes have
suddenly opened—and that we
misjudged you!$k$pYou have my gravest apologies,
Prince Alfonse. All this time, we
were operating under a deception.$k$pWe had it upside down. The Order
of Heroes came here to save us
all from the Emblian Empire!$k$pI only hope you can forgive us.
You have my deep gratitude for
rescuing our realm.$k

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Our mission succeeded! We have
saved the World of Awakening.$k$pOf course, it's all thanks to you,
$Nu.$k$pI can see that with every success,
your confidence grows. You give
orders without hesitation.$k$pThe Order of Heroes is truly
fortunate to have you.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile2|$w0|You know, there's something about
their tactician that reminds me
of you, $Nu.$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's like...you have the same aura or
something. Oh, don't worry. I'm still
your number-one fan!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|It shouldn't surprise us that two
people might seem alike, given
how many worlds there are.$k$pWhy, there are probably many more
than two—hundreds, even!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Well, now you're getting carried
away, Commander.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|$Sbs1000|Think so? Hmm. You never know.
Anyway, let's get back to Askr.
We've finished our work here.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$EFace_Pain|Oh no. I've just gotten an urgent
report...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Embla is at the gateway that leads
into the World of Mystery—again!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Veronica must be hoping to regain
Marth. Won't she ever stop trying to
get the Hero-King in her clutches?$k$pAnd if not him, who might she be
trying to get this time?$k$Sbs150|
